result.execSummary:
The defendant Samantha M Despiegelaere was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Must report to Probation today (5/9/16).

15CF250 - Count 1

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to the Clerk of Court's Office.  Bond to be applied.  Remaining balance to be paid in a payment plan of $25.00 per month beginning 8/1/2016, and due on the 1st of each month thereafter until paid in full.

Must pay a $200.00 DNA surcharge to the Clerk of Court's Office.  Bond to be applied.  Remaining balance to be paid in a payment plan of $25.00 per month beginning 8/1/2016, and due on the 1st of each month thereafter until paid in full.
No ABUSIVE contact with Taylor Grunow.
Must provide DNA sample today (5/9/16) at the Polk County Jail.

timeConds.notes: Banked/stayed for use by Probation if necessary

SENTENCING:

15CF20 - Count 1 - CT withholcds sent.  Probation 3 years.  Ct banks 180 days in jail.  Absolute sobriety, comply with programs.  AODA & compliance.  1 day jail credit.  $295.60 fine/cost.  $250 DNA surcharge.  No firearm.  Can not vote.  

15CF238 - Count 3 - Ct withholds sent.  Probation 2 years, concurrent.  Ct banks 30 days jail. 1 day jail credit.  $265.60 fine/cost, plus $200 DNA 

15CF250 - Count 1 Ct - withholds sent.  Probation 2 years, concurrent.  Ct banks 30 days jail.  39 days jail credit.  $265.60 fine/cost - no DNA surcharge.
